util:list.beans:value: RFC 4398: Section 2.1

beans:bean.p:nameDisplay: D10 - Certificate discovery in LDAP with one unavailable LDAP server

util:list.beans:value: RFC 2782: Page 3\, Priority Section

beans:property.name: description
beans:property.beans:value: This test case verifies that your system can query DNS for SRV records and attempts to connect to an LDAP server based on the priority value specified in the SRV records until a successful connection is made. Your system should first attempt to connect to an LDAP server associated with an SRV record containing the lowest priority value (highest priority). Since this LDAP server is unavailable, your system should then attempt to connect to the LDAP server associated with an SRV record containing the second lowest priority value (second highest priority) and discover the valid address-bound X.509 certificate in the available LDAP server.

beans:property.name: targetCertificate
beans:property.beans:value: A valid address-bound certificate in an LDAP server with the appropriate mail attribute and InetOrgPerson schema. The associated SRV record has Priority = 1.

beans:bean.p:nameDisplay: D11 - No certificates discovered in DNS CERT records and no SRV records

beans:property.name: description
beans:property.beans:value: This test case verifies that your system does not find any certificates when querying DNS for CERT records and does not find any SRV records in DNS.

beans:bean.p:nameDisplay: D12 - No certificates found in DNS CERT records and no available LDAP servers

beans:property.name: description
beans:property.beans:value: This test case verifies that your system can query DNS for SRV records and attempts to connect to an LDAP server associated with the only SRV record that should be found. Since this LDAP server is unavailable or does not exist and no additional SRV records should have been found, your system should not discover any X.509 certificates in either DNS CERT records or LDAP servers.

beans:bean.p:nameDisplay: D13 - No certificates discovered in DNS CERT records or LDAP servers

beans:property.name: description
beans:property.beans:value: This test case verifies that your system does not discover any certificates in DNS CERT records or LDAP servers when no certificates should be found.
